hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $73+20$ then add $8$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{73}+\purpleC{28}=&\greenD{73}+(\purpleC{20}+\purpleC{8}) \\
=&(\greenD{73}+\purpleC{20})+\purpleC{8}  \\
\end{align}$


>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategy can be used to add $73+28$.**

- Add $73+20$ then add $8$.

question.content:
